verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Alas! And did my Savior bleed? And did my Sov'reign die? Would He devote that sacred head For sinners such as I?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: At the cross, at the cross where I first saw the light, And the burden of my heart rolled away, It was there by faith I received my sight, And now I am happy all the day!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was it for crimes that I have done He groaned upon the tree? Amazing pity! grace unknown! And love beyond degree!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Well might the sun in darkness hide, And shut his glories in, When Christ, the mighty Maker, died For man the creature's sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: But drops of grief can ne’er repay The debt of love I owe: Here, Lord, I give my self away, ’Tis all that I can do!
